author: Julia Brucculieri
title: Sarah Paulson And Millie Bobby Brown Just Had The Most Adorable Twitter Exchange
text:
Sarah Paulson And Millie Bobby Brown Just Had The Most Adorable Twitter Exchange More of this, please. Julia Brucculieri Entertainment Writer, The Huffington Post Phillip Faraone via Getty Images The cutest. 
These days, the internet is a depressing place. But sometimes, it gives us adorable moments, like this Twitter exchange between Eleven Millie Bobby Brown and Sarah Paulson . 
On Wednesday, a Twitter user who goes by LeG¬Æand shared a photo of Entertainment Weekly‚Äôs latest cover, which features the kids from ‚Äú Stranger Things .‚Äù In the shot, Brown sports short curly hair, which LeG¬Æand pointed out looks almost exactly like the wig Paulson wore for her role as Marcia Clark on ‚ÄúThe People v. O. J. Simpson: American Crime Story.‚Äù @milliebbrown you look like a young version of @MsSarahPaulson 's Marcia Clark pic.twitter.com/m4y3pCVYkM ‚Äî LeG¬Æand (@LGCatalan) February 8, 2017 
Paulson saw the tweet and expressed her delight. 
‚ÄúThis is my favorite thing ever,‚Äù she wrote. @LGCatalan @milliebbrown this is my favorite thing ever. ‚Äî Sarah Paulson (@MsSarahPaulson) February 8, 2017 
Brown saw it too and tweeted back at the Golden Globe winner and Twitter user who shared the initial image. 
‚ÄúI know right this is so great,‚Äù she said, before calling herself and Paulson ‚Äútwinneys.‚Äù I know right this is so great üòútwinneys!@MsSarahPaulson @LGcatalan ‚ù§Ô∏èÔ∏è https://t.co/mghEx6kqU7 ‚Äî Millie Bobby Brown (@milliebbrown) February 8, 2017 
More of this, please.
